programme.desc: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec bring you reporting from the magazine that helps global leaders stay ahead, plus insight on the people, companies and trends shaping todays complex economy.

programme.title: Bloomberg Balance of Power
programme.desc: Bloomberg Balance of Power focuses on politics and policies on Capitol Hill, in President Trumps administration, the federal agencies and the courts.

programme.title: Courage The Cowardly Dog
programme.desc: Vacationing on a cruise ship that sinks, Muriel, Courage and the Farmer end up on a deserted island. The one inhabitant they find is Katz, who runs an unusual resort.

programme.title: Regular Show
programme.desc: Mordecai and Rigby decide to make prank phone calls. They try to prank the Master Prank Caller numerous times, although they fail to fool him and only make him increasingly annoyed.

programme.title: Chowder
programme.desc: Chowder must make a delivery to the scariest house in Marzipan City.

programme.title: Courage The Cowardly Dog
programme.desc: Courage, Muriel and Eustace check into a motel run by a sinister cat named Katz. A very long night is in store for the three, especially after Katz turns loose his spiders.

programme.title: Brave Bunnies
programme.desc: In the Jungle, the Brave Bunnies paint at their art table. Kara the CHAMELEON hops from flower to flower, changing color to disappear, like magic!

programme.title: Brave Bunnies
programme.desc: A toppled tree in the savannah stops the Bunnies on their journey, but Bop thinks it makes a great obstacle course!

programme.title: Mumfie
programme.desc: Jelly Bean has written to his favourite singer saying that he was the special advisor and friend of the king of the island where he lives. Now the singer has decided to visit.

programme.title: Mumfie
programme.desc: This year it is Pinkeys turn to organize the flower festival. Despite the support of Mumfie and Jelly Bean, the little pig is very unsure of herself.

programme.title: Mercenaries From Hong Kong
programme.desc: Filmmaker Wong Jing produced Mercenaries From Hong Kong, his very first modernday adventure drama. In the dramatic plot he wrote, he sends superstars Ti Lung, Chen Huimin, Wang Lungwei, Lo Lieh and Wang Yu on a deadly mission. The films action sequences are all closely guided by three great kung fu choreographers, led by Tang Chia!

programme.title: Return of the Phoenix
programme.desc: An imperial minister Cheng betroths his pretty younger daughter, Ye, to his friends son, Mu. His wife however, refuses to let Ye marry before her elder daughter Yan, who is ugly and undesirable. Yan is asked to pretend as Ye to meet Mu but scares him away. A rich guy who likes Ye meanwhile pretends as Mu to attend the wedding...

programme.title: The Wandering Swordsman
programme.desc: The wandering swordsman Yu Hsieh Erh has formidable sword skills and helps the poor by robbing from thieves and distributing the wealth. He meets a group of bandits who are planning to rob a convoy escorting some valuables and is tricked into participating in the robbery. Yu soon realizes his folly and returns to take revenge on the bandits.

programme.title: Singapore Tonight
programme.desc: From business to politics, health to technology, the latest news from Singapore and analysis of the impact.

programme.title: Insight
programme.desc: China faces an aging population. But in a country where filial piety is a virtue, sending parents to care facilities is a social stigma. How will China navigate the cultural shift around elder care?

programme.title: Asia Tonight 20252026
programme.desc: CNA correspondents bring you the top stories of the day with live reports and interviews to keep you uptodate on the days events.x000D

programme.title: Inside The Womens Prison
programme.desc: In the first episode of this threepart series, we follow six inmates as they navigate the rigor and realities of life behind bars. x000Dx000D

programme.title: Happier Times, Grump
programme.desc: When Grumps wife dies, he sees no reason to live on. But just as his coffin is finished, Grump gets a new spark and a major secret! His teenage granddaughter is in trouble and needs help and wisdom from her grandfather, and the warmth of his fireplace.

programme.title: Ghost Town Anthology
programme.desc: Set in a small town in Quebec, the film centres on the inhabitants of the town who are struggling to cope after teenager Simon Dub is killed in a car accident. As the family and town grieve, the residents begin to report several ghost sightings.

programme.title: REV

programme.title: Planet A
programme.desc: The next generation of geothermal energy reaches deep down to use the warmth of the Earths core. This endless energy resource is available anywhere in the world at the right depth, and technology and knowhow from oil and gas drilling is being repurposed to bring down the costs of tapping it. We look at the benefits, as well as the challenges and risks of Geothermal 2.0.

programme.title: Close up
programme.desc: Long one of the safest countries in South America, Ecuador is at risk of becoming a narcostate. 1,300 people were murdered in the first 50 days of 2025. This film follows victims families, documenting their strength as they fight for democracy.

programme.title: DocFilm
programme.desc: Mundiya Kepangas fight against deforestation has paid off. The leader of the Huli tribe in the forests of Papua New Guinea is delighted that the government wants to make the country a global role model for sustainable forest management.

programme.title: Aging In The Wild
programme.desc: Human, plant, animal, bacteria, all have one inevitable thing in common death. In this episode we discover the ways in which aging animals defy our usual understanding of the circle of life.

programme.title: Aging In The Wild
programme.desc: In this episode we meet some animal elders who help us understand the psychological mechanisms associated with long life and the positive social value longlived animals bring to their communities.

programme.desc: When Sofia earns an internship with Daniel Boulud, Buddy is tasked with making a cake for the famous French chef and his staff. But a New Jersey heatwave threatens to ruin everything.

programme.title: Buried In Barstow
programme.desc: Angie Harmon stars as Hazel King, a single mother determined to shield her daughter from the life she once had while protecting and defending those who cant protect themselves.

programme.title: Disappearance In Yellowstone
programme.desc: When Jessies car breaks down in the middle of a national park and her daughter locks herself inside, she heads off to look for help, but returns to her car to discover her daughter has vanished.

programme.title: Planet Weird 1
programme.desc: Discover how weirdness is baked into some animals DNA from birth. Check out the bowerbirds funky mateattracting dance moves, the Christmas Island crabs trafficdodging prowess, and the sockeye salmons incredible uphill swimming skills.

programme.title: Planet Weird 1
programme.desc: Look at the supercharged abilities that give some animals an edge in life. Discover fireflies flirty flashes, the tarsiers incredible night vision, the mantis shrimps knockout punch, and the saltwater crocs preydetecting pressure sensors.

programme.title: Cub Camp 1
programme.desc: Experience the joys of rain and climbing with Yasmine and Yara, and watch Winston take a dip in his new pool. Go hunting for dropped radio collars with Roger and Steve, then see what happens when the two groups of summer cubs come facetoface.

programme.title: Supersenses 1
programme.desc: Vision its how ninetyfive percent of animals interpret the world. Every species on Earth is a chapter in the fascinating story of sight. This episode follows that story from blurry beginnigs to mindblowing hexnocular vision.

programme.title: Rock.Alt.Indie
programme.desc: Plug in your guitar and amp up the volume because were bringing you the best of the best from the Rock, Alternative and Indie scene!

programme.title: The Amazons MTV Live Stage
programme.desc: MTV Brand New nominees The Amazons smash up the MTV Live Stage with a killer set featuring riffheavy tracks Little Something and In My Mind, amongst others.

programme.desc: Adam Lambert comes in to MTV HQ to talk about the music videos that have made him into the successful artist he is today! What was the first video he ever saw on MTV and whos his biggest inspiration?

programme.title: HD Hits!
programme.desc: Weve got big hits and theyre even bigger in high def baby!

programme.title: NEWSROOM TOKYO
programme.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the days news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Since Russia began its invasion of Ukraine, Chujo Hideto has been working to support children who have been traumatized by the conflict. He talks about how he hopes to make a difference.

programme.title: Trails to Oishii Tokyo Mini
programme.desc: Shirasu are baby Japanese anchovies. Known for their clear, silverywhite appearance, these tiny things are packed with umami and nutrients.

programme.title: Ukiyoe EDOLIFE2
programme.desc: The top 3 geisha idol celebrities in Edo Tomimoto Toyohina, Takashima Ohisa, and Naniwaya Kita. See how Kitagawa Utamaro, the master of female beauty has illustrated them so differently.

programme.title: Im Still Here
programme.desc: Keiko Ogura, age 85, has spent her life talking to the world about her experiences as an Abomb victim in Hiroshima. When she talks with Americans in a small college town, what does she discover?

programme.title: Timelapse Journey
programme.desc: Kamikochi is a beautiful mountainous region in Nagano Prefecture thats 1,500m above sea level. With a mirrorlike pond and rime ice, see the frozen beauty of Kamikochi through timelapse photography.

programme.title: Seasoning the Seasons
programme.desc: This program visits places across Japan to introduce the charms of their local daily life and festivals fostered by the nations long history.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Medical Frontiers
programme.desc: From prevention to cure! The groundbreaking world of Japanese medical technology and healthcare. For your healthy lifestyle, this program shows tips of superfoods and easy exercises.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: When Mayor Humdinger disrupts Adventure Bay with his barking kitties, Katie and the pups must rescue the town. Capn Turbot loses his glasses and creates chaos in his path. Its up to the Paw Patrol to save him and his specs!

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: When Mayor Humdingers giant neon sign of himself gets loose, the Paw Patrol must stop it from rolling through town. Sweetie steals a painting of the Princess and attempts to replace it with one of herself.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: The Paw Patrol draws a message on Farmer Als field to tell the space aliens the pups found their lost toy!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: Rubble & the pups find Grandpa Gravels lucky bowling ball. Too bad Builder Cove doesnt have a bowling alley... until now! When a sudden superbloom traps Motor, Lily, and Park Ranger Rose, the pups need a flowerfriendly construction solution.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: After Speed Meister sabotages Builder Covegiving Day, its up to the pups to save the holiday for everyone in Builder Cove. Mix dreams about giving the moon a Mix makeover. Rubble and the pups make her dream a reality with a new boardwalk ride!

programme.title: DORA
programme.desc: Doras crab friends are getting married but Swiper swipes the ring and loses it in the ocean. Dora has to get the ring back! Dora and Boots meet Vicky the Vicua who is missing her magic flute that she needs to go back to the Cloud Kingdom.

programme.title: Baby Sharks Big Show!
programme.desc: When an underwater storm rains on Baby Shark and Williams fun, they doubt whether they can have an adventure indoors. William and Vola enter a Young Scientist Contest and their competitive spirit gets them into a sticky situation.

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: When Sharkdog steals the show in the new aquarium commercial, Max must overcome a serious case of jealousy.

programme.title: Sharkdog

programme.title: Sharkdog

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and her family go to the museum. Peppa imagines herself as a Queen in the King and Queens room. George imagines being a big dinosaur in the Dinosaur Room.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: It is a super hot day, and all the mud puddles have dried up, so Peppa and George play in the wading pool.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George visit their cousin Chloes house, where they put on a puppet show about a pig who snores a lot. Daddy Pig and Uncle Pig miss the show as they are too busy snoring.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa instructs Daddy Pig to do lots of exercise to do as he is a bit fat. Daddy Pig is horrified to learn you have to exercise every day to get fit.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show
programme.desc: Chef wants to host dinner and a show, but struggles when he cant seem to get any of his magic tricks right. Chef aims to make an EXTREME snack for Henrys EXTREME cousin, but he accidentally makes his spicy cauliflower bites too spicy!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: A new secret Krabby Patty formula has disastrous results for Bikini Bottom, and only SpongeBob can save the day. Mr. Krabs and Plankton have to take boating school classes. Thankfully, SpongeBobs there to show them the ropes!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: When Mr. Krabs gets in trouble for littering, he makes SpongeBob and Squidward clean up Bikini Bottom. A sea bunny ravages Squidwards garden, but SpongeBob thinks its cute!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: When his clarinet goes missing, Squidward must become a hardboiled detective to track it down. Squidward sends SpongeBob and Patrick on an increasingly difficult scavenger hunt to get them out of his hair.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: When Storm gets close to beating him in a waffleeating contest, Greedy takes the competition too far. When Gargamel sleepwalks into the Smurfs Village, the Smurfs make the most of the situation.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Farmers snails are tired of their life of toil and decide to go on strike and join Wild for a life of freedom. The Smurfs prepare for their sarsaparilla banquet, unaware that Gargamel has enchanted the thicket.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Laird is nervous to host movie night at his house, so Ronnie Anne helps him pretend Arturos pad is his own! Carlota cant seem to pay attention to anything but her phone, so Carlos sets her up with a math tutor!

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Used to being top dog, Carl cant handle when Adelaide joins his karate class and becomes the star student. Hector starts selling Rosas delicious tacos but gets overwhelmed when theyre more popular than the mercado!

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Carl takes Rosas chancla, setting off the balance of order in the city, & calling the Chancla Force into action! Carlitos goes on a wild adventure to get his favorite stuffed animal from the arcade.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob befriends a sentient Krabby Patty whose only wish is to be eaten. Rube hosts an episode of FUNBelievable! With Rube where he explores little known oddities and attractions around Bikini Bottom.
